title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SpeechToTextConfig
name: SpeechToTextConfig
description:
Configures speech transcription for [ConversationProfile][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.ConversationProfile].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SpeechToTextConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.speech_model_variant
params.description: Optional. The speech model used in speech to text. SPEECH_MODEL_VARIANT_UNSPECIFIED, USE_BEST_AVAILABLE will be treated as USE_ENHANCED. It can be overridden in [AnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AnalyzeContentRequest] and [StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest] request.

methods.name: getSpeechModelVariant
methods.description:
Optional. The speech model used in speech to text.

SPEECH_MODEL_VARIANT_UNSPECIFIED, USE_BEST_AVAILABLE will be treated as USE_ENHANCED. It can be overridden in [AnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AnalyzeContentRequest] and [StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest] request.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SpeechModelVariant speech_model_variant = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];

methods.name: setSpeechModelVariant
methods.description:
Optional. The speech model used in speech to text.

SPEECH_MODEL_VARIANT_UNSPECIFIED, USE_BEST_AVAILABLE will be treated as USE_ENHANCED. It can be overridden in [AnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AnalyzeContentRequest] and [StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest] request.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SpeechModelVariant speech_model_variant = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];

params.name: var
params.description:
Optional. The speech model used in speech to text.

SPEECH_MODEL_VARIANT_UNSPECIFIED, USE_BEST_AVAILABLE will be treated as USE_ENHANCED. It can be overridden in [AnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AnalyzeContentRequest] and [StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.StreamingAnalyzeContentRequest] request.
